author: Casey Newton
title: How location data could play a role in managing the coronavirus crisis
description: From electronic fences in Taiwan to mobile alerts in Israel, countries are finding creative ways to monitor the outbreak. But privacy activists are justifiably worried about infringement on civil liberties
content:
